metadata.title: CVE-2022-1789 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: With shadow paging enabled, the INVPCID instruction results in a call tokvm_mmu_invpcid_gva. If INVPCID is executed with CR0.PG=0, the invlpgcallback is not set and the result is a NULL pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
